en.signup-message: Stay Ahead: Weekly Insights and Guides on Tech, Business, and Growth.
en.about-title: I'm an Engineer, Maker, and Writer
about-description: I share everything I learn about tech, business and continuous growth on my Blog and Social Media.
My mission is to create tools and resources that not only enhance professional skills but also foster personal growth.
en.blog-section-description: Sharing insights, ideas, notes and comprehensive how-to guides around tech, business, and continuous growth.
en.project-section-title: Start here: Tools and Resources to Elevate Yourself

projects.name: Pulpodcast
projects.description: A virtual coffee break in Spanish, hosted by professionals from leading companies like Apple, Intel, and P&G. Tune in to explore current trends and boost your professional development. Let's grow together!

projects.name: Pulpo Mentorship Program
projects.description: Connect with mentors from leading companies like Apple, Intel and P&G, and receive personalized guidance to boost your professional development.

projects.name: My Blog
projects.description: Sharing insights and comprehensive how-to guides around tech, business, and continuous growth.

es.signup-message: Mantente Actualizado: Artículos Semanales y Guías sobre Tecnología, Negocios y Crecimiento Personal.

Mi misión es crear herramientas y recursos que no solo mejoren las habilidades profesionales, sino que también fomenten el crecimiento personal.

es.project-section-title: Empieza aquí: Herramientas y Recursos para Elevar tu Potencial
